project.title: Pong 2
project.description: !format Created in the Gamedev@IU Design+Prototype Lab, **Pong 2** is a new take on an old classic. Featuring a radial playfield and rhythm-based competition, the game has already received positive responses from players and would provide a great basis for future development.
project.feature: Dynamic event-driven system to handle rhythm-based mechanics
Custom rhythm-based physics system to handle ball motion
